mainObjective: Uncover who has been sabotaging Greenwatch Village’s defenses and warn the elders before nightfall.

plotPoints.title: Into the Verdantwood Wilds
plotPoints.description: The party is tasked with investigating strange disappearances and eerie lights deep within the Verdantwood Wilds. Upon entering the swamp, they must navigate treacherous terrain and avoid natural hazards while searching for clues about the disturbances. Along the way, they encounter local hermits and cryptic markings carved into the willow trees, hinting at something unnatural at play.
plotPoints.plotImpact: The party establishes their presence in the Wilds and gathers the first clues, setting the stage for unraveling the central mystery.

sideQuests.title: Firefly Rescue
sideQuests.description: Iridescent fireflies are vanishing from the swamp, throwing the local ecosystem off-balance. A reclusive druid offers guidance if the party can discover the cause and restore balance.
sideQuests.plotImpact: Completing this quest earns the trust of local wildlife and may grant a magical boon for navigating the swamp.

sideQuests.title: The Sunken Cache
sideQuests.description: The party stumbles upon a partially sunken merchant's satchel. Recovering it (without attracting dangerous swamp beasts) could reveal useful supplies or clues about the missing villagers.
sideQuests.plotImpact: Provides a clue pointing toward recent bandit activity deeper in the Wilds.

plotPoints.title: The Bandit Encampment
plotPoints.description: Following clues, the party tracks a group of bandits to a makeshift encampment hidden amidst dense undergrowth. The camp is camouflaged and guarded by traps and lookouts. The party must decide between stealth, negotiation, or direct confrontation to learn what the bandits know about the disappearances.
plotPoints.plotImpact: Depending on the party’s approach, they might secure an uneasy alliance, gain intelligence, or provoke a hostile pursuit.

sideQuests.title: Bandit Betrayal
sideQuests.description: One bandit, Tavrin Quickfoot, wants out. If convinced, Tavrin offers secret routes through the swamp and insight into the bandit leader’s plans.
sideQuests.plotImpact: Gaining Tavrin's help makes later travel safer and reveals a hidden shortcut to the next major threat.

plotPoints.title: The Heart of the Corruption
plotPoints.description: Strange magic pulses from an ancient willow at the heart of the Wilds, warping flora and fauna. The party discovers Kella of the Glades, a wild-eyed hermit, performing rituals to awaken an ancient guardian. Kella claims the land is under threat, and only drastic measures can save it. The party must decide whether to aid, oppose, or outwit Kella—whose actions may do more harm than good.
plotPoints.plotImpact: The party’s choices here determine the fate of the swamp and the threat level for the final confrontation.

sideQuests.title: The Withering Blight
sideQuests.description: Patches of sickly, dying flora are spreading. Investigating these blights reveals a connection to the ancient willow’s magic and the true nature of the corruption.
sideQuests.plotImpact: Provides vital information about how to weaken or cleanse the corruption at its source.

plotPoints.title: Shadows Among the Hollows
plotPoints.description: As twilight falls, the party faces the true mastermind: Bandit Lieutenant Karsk, who seeks to bind the awakened ancient guardian to his will using artifacts stolen from villagers and the corrupted heartwood. Combat, negotiation, or clever subterfuge will decide the fate of Verdantwood Wilds. The swamp’s spirits, emboldened or appeased by the party's earlier actions, may intervene.
plotPoints.plotImpact: The resolution here has lasting effects on the Wilds—restoring balance, plunging it further into darkness, or earning new allies for the future.

sideQuests.title: Spirit’s Bargain
sideQuests.description: A mysterious swamp spirit offers aid in exchange for a promise. Keeping or breaking the promise may affect the outcome of the showdown with Karsk.
sideQuests.plotImpact: Securing the spirit’s aid may tip the balance in the final battle or lead to long-term consequences for the party.
